2.10USRealmHeader2.10USRealmPatientName.USRealmHeadern/aCDA Header/cda:ClinicalDocument/cda:recordTarget/cda:patientRole/cda:patient/cda:namestring(@id=true()// text()) = ""/cda:ClinicalDocument/cda:recordTarget/cda:patientRole/cda:patient/cda:name[string(@id=true()// text()) = ""]ClinicalDocumentn/an/an/a/USRealmHeader2/recordTarget/patientRole/patient/nameGeneralHeaderConstraintsUSRealmPatientNameUSRealmPatientNameMixedContent
2.19Referral Note (V2)2.19.1SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-28947, CONF:1198-28948, CONF:1198-32911 ) such that it
  1. SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.14"
  2. SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
Referral Note (V2).templateId1..1CDA Header/cda:ClinicalDocument/cda:templateId[@root = "2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.14"]cda:templateId/@root = "2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.14" and @extension = "2015-08-01"/cda:ClinicalDocument[cda:templateId/@root = "2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.22.1.14" and @extension = "2015-08-01"]platform:/resource/org.openhealthtools.mdht.uml.hl7.datatypes/model/datatypes.uml#_culQ8DxaEd6JwqSGecoePgn/an/an/a/ReferralNoteGeneralHeaderConstraintsTemplateId

4.3AdvanceDirectiveObservation4.3.10.ii.dThe text, if present, MAY contain zero or one [0..1] reference. a. The URL of a referenced advance directive document MAY be present, and SHALL be represented in Observation/reference/ExternalDocument/text/reference. b. If a URL is referenced, then it SHOULD have a corresponding linkHTML element in narrative block. 4.6AgeObservation4.6.1SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:7899 ) such that it

4.134Result Organizer (V3)4.134.1SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] templateId ( CONF:1198-7126, CONF:1198-9134, CONF:1198-32588 ) such that it

  2. SHALL contain exactly one [1..1] @extension="2015-08-01"
